text: Moses Veerasammy Nagamootoo (born November 30, 1947 in Whim) is a Guyanese politician of the Alliance for Change. He was the Prime Minister of Guyana from May 20, 2015 to August 2, 2020. He has also written a novel. Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Guyanese novelists Category:Prime Ministers of Guyana
title: Moses Nagamootoo
